faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: We answer frequently asked questions from our customers

items.question: Can NFC be used on any smartphone?
items.answer:
Compatible with 95% of smartphones. Available on iPhone 7 and later, and Android NFC-compatible models.
For specific compatible models, please check the official website of each smartphone manufacturer.

items.question: What is the accuracy of business card reading?
items.answer:
AI business card shooting and VCard conversion accuracy is 95%. We aim for further accuracy improvement through continuous improvement.
If recognition fails, manual correction is also possible.

items.question: Can I change the design myself?
items.answer:
Unlimited design changes are possible from the management screen.
You can choose from 3 types of light colors (white, light blue, beige), and text and contact information can be easily updated.

items.question: Please tell me how to use multilingual support
items.answer:
You can switch to 4 languages (Japanese, English, Chinese, Spanish) yourself.
You can select the display language on the profile screen, so you can use it in your preferred language regardless of the other party's smartphone language settings.

items.question: Can it be used offline?
items.answer:
Currently, we recommend using it in an online environment.
Offline functionality is under consideration for the future. We prioritize stable service provision in an online environment, taking advantage of the no-app benefit.
